about_the_game:
Milksoup is an FPS tower defense about an army of little red dumplings trying to steal your cereal.
Movement will be your key to survival as you strafe and b-hop throughout the surreal environments; The longer you last, the more scrap you earn to build towers that help you defend against the ever-increasing hoard. With a variety of goons emerging from the roster, you'll have to strategize your playstyle for each wave you find yourself in.
Ever need a break? Go into a Sandbox map and explore the nooks and crannies of the world you inhabit.

MOVE



-
  • Utilize the various techniques in your moveset including strafe-jumping, sliding, and b-hopping.
  • With physics-based movement, you can stay on a roll with persistent momentum while moving across maps.
  • Equip various weapons that can be abused to bring you to greater heights, like a gun's intense aerial knockback.

ATTACK



-
  • Take advantage of your arsenal, equipping melee and ranged weapons to swap between quickly.
  • Overwhelm enemies with unique combos that take them down quickly.
  • Experiment and find what weapons work best against the various dumplings in the hoard.

DEFEND



-
  • Craft various towers that stave off the hoard.
  • Upgrade your towers to fill different niches, like burning through gangs of smaller enemies or chipping away at heftier dumplings.
  • Reap the rewards and feed them back into your defense system.

EXPERIMENT



-
  • Find hidden easter eggs in the sandbox maps.
  • Use the Spawn Gun to spawn enemies and test their strengths and weaknesses.
  • Gain unlimited access to all Towers and their upgrades while in sandbox maps.

name: Milksoup

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7500 / Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / RX 580 - 6GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Milksoup is an FPS tower defense about a bunch of dumplings trying to steal your cereal. Movement is key as you strafe through the surreal environments, striking down baddies with your silver spoon.
